name: Prison Riot MC
description:
Start an uncontrollable prison riot with the sound of your voice! 

Time to get revenge on the smug warden. Big boss Randy has snuck me into the gate control room. He promised me and my family  'fat stacks of cash' to help him escape. Every prisoner out is another dollar in my pocket. 

***This game requires a MICROPHONE***

This game was submitted to the GMTK 2020 gamejam  with the theme "Out Of Control". This game follows the theme in a couple ways.

  1. You start an out of control prison riot.
  2. The voice commands only open/close gates, they do not directly control the escaping prisoners

Credits:

ALEX PRITCHARD
ALLEN RUFOLO
STEVE YOUNG
ALEX DEPATIE

WAY TO GO TEAM! =]
